Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23841 affecting package shim-unsigned-aarch64 for versions less than 15.8-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-23841 affecting package shim-unsigned-aarch64 for versions less than 15.8-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package shim-unsigned-aarch64 is earlier than 15.8-5, affected by CVE-2021-23841
